## VirtualScrollPagingAbstractComponent class

Abstract class that represents virtual scroll paging component base

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class VirtualScrollPagingAbstractComponent<TOptions extends VirtualScrollPagingOptions> extends PagingAbstractComponent<CssClassesVirtualScrollPaging, TOptions> implements VirtualScrollPaging, OnDestroy 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_bodyObserver](./grid.virtualscrollpagingabstractcomponent._bodyobserver.md) |  | <code>MutationObserver</code> | Mutation observer for checking for changes in body |
|  [\_displayedPages](./grid.virtualscrollpagingabstractcomponent._displayedpages.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Currently displayed pages |
|  [\_loading](./grid.virtualscrollpagingabstractcomponent._loading.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that data are loading |
|  [firstItemIndex](./grid.virtualscrollpagingabstractcomponent.firstitemindex.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Zero based index of first displayed item on page |
|  [itemsPerPage](./grid.virtualscrollpagingabstractcomponent.itemsperpage.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Gets or sets number of items currently used for paging |
|  [page](./grid.virtualscrollpagingabstractcomponent.page.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Gets or sets index of currently selected page - NOT USED |
|  [totalCount](./grid.virtualscrollpagingabstractcomponent.totalcount.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Gets or sets number of all items that are paged with current filter criteria |
